roleset.name: not agreeable to some state/action
roleset.note: UNWILLING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT_4,5. Relation to will.02. (from unwilling.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Mitch and the Boner are out there complaining that the President is circumventing Congress because he 's unwilling to work with them .
